website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly option with a traditional look. We love the vibrant colors and choice of several different color palettes.
pros: Woven recycled polypropylene allows the mat to breathe and satisfies those who strive for a green way of life
cons: It's very lightweight and may need anchoring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to the front porch
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone who needs a durable, and colorful, addition to their living space. Everyone is surprised when I tell them it is plastic, because it looks like it is made of natural fiber. The colors are very bright, and the design is great. I needed a large rug that was waterproof, and that wouldn't trap debris as it is on my front porch. It is easy to sweep, and a really nice piece of design to add to my porch. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mat and such vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mat and such vibrant colors. Goes straight from box to floor with no problem, no smell, no wrinkles. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BohunkIrishGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Colors and Nice plastic Material
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Colors and Nice plastic Material. I actually am using it for a living room rug, my children are constantly ruining my rugs with drinks ect and this one is easy to clean and doesnt leave stains since its a plastic material. Matches me Decor perfectly! Oh and you can vacuum over it with out any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and design!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 4x6 red mat locally several years ago and love it. This time I ordered the 5x8 aqua mat and it is equally beautiful. It is actually more of a torquoise or teal than aqua, which I knew before ordering and prefer. If you like bright colors and an exotic design you will love this mat. Because it is so light, it will catch a strong wind, and move even metal patio chairs. Be sure to use the enclosed stick-on pads to attach it to the patio. The attached photos are on my dining room floor before putting it outside, but it shows the colors well.
customer_reviews.author: LizOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality materials, looks really beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THUS MAT! I’m addicted to this company and their mats, really great quality, the product is beautiful, brightens up the room, I love that my naughty dogs can use it as a placemat for dinner, and then I can easily wipe it off or take it outside and hose it down, let it dry and bring it back inside and it’s good as new. There’s nothing about this rug/mat that I don’t like. I will be purchasing more in the future. And I think for the price point it’s a great product and love that it’s recycled materials!
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Can't speak to durability or wear
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Can't speak to durability or wear, as it just came, but it looks great! It has really transformed our tired porch space and covered up decks in need of eventual replacing. I will get another for the other deck. I love the Turkish rug design and wish they had a matching smaller doormat sized one. I also wish they Greek Key design or something more Grecian/Mediterranean.
customer_reviews.author: KatPhil

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy. Rippled.
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase, 1 star. Will not flatten out after weeks. All 4 edges are tripping hazards. It’s obvious to me as a weaver that the warp tension was completely irregular. I didn’t save the packaging since I thought it would flatten with time. It has not and I wish I hadn’t purchased it. First purchase 5 stars:I thought this was going to be too bright but it looks great with my camper van. Placing this outside keeps the inside of the van clean, and the rug is sturdy, light, and cheerful, and easy to shake out before heading home from the campground. My traveling companion likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT POP OF COLOR TO WARM UP THIS SPACE
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to ground my little table and chair set. This brightly colored little rug did just the trick. The space is inviting now and lively. I ordered the 4x6 aqua rug. I have 2 pillows on order for the chairs. The material is made from recycled plastics. I just got it today so I don't know how it will do over time, but I'm pleased with it so far! Many area rugs I've ordered came wrapped in plastic with a lot of tape. This was very nicely rolled up with elastic at each end, then placed in a plastic sleeve, then placed in a sturdy box. The rug flattened out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: servicepuppyraiser

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The turquoise is not my usual color palette, but despite looking at hundreds of rugs, I kept coming back to this. I find the fact that it is made from recycled plastic a gift to my recycler's heart. I was worried my browser was not accurate, but it was spot on. I have the rug on a distressed floor in a laundry room area / work out equipment room. It makes the room looks like an adult inhabits it. How fun that it is reversible. And the idea that cleaning is a water hose and drip dry, who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug - for mudroom
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this rug for our mudroom. The floor is concrete so we wanted to make a little more cozy and enjoyable to be in while taking off shoes. The rug is perfect. It's very colorful, it doesn't look cheap and it's made of a plastic but it doesn't really look it. It cleans up easy, doesn't show dirt and really brightens up the space. Water does go through to the other size as it doesn't have a rubber back but I knew that when I bought it. I love it and I'm sure I will buy more mad mats in the future. The rug is exactly like it is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: mama4512

customer_reviews.title: Great floor mat!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable. I love that it's made out of recyclable materials and well-suited for the outdoors. The colors are also very vibrant. I get tons of compliments on it! Perfect for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Idi

customer_reviews.title: These rugs are made from recycled plastic bottles, etc. Win Win
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mad Mats rug....I bought one exactly like this about 10 years ago and absolutely loved it. I laid it on my patio under the table and four chairs and it made my patio POP! I live on the Central Coast of California so we have a lot of sun and eventually the part the got the most sun fell apart, as would any product in all those years. I have been looking for another since and TA DA Amazon had the large size, color and pattern I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird Lover

customer_reviews.title: First Day: very pleased at quality and packaging
customer_reviews.text: The rug was packed beautifully, easy to open, good black bands holding it together, strong plastic wrapper. As I was opening the box I was saying, “This is so easy and well done. Nice Vendor” It is 100 degrees in Arizona, I fearlessly put the rug out in my patio. I need strong color in the Arizona Sun. I have no report on durability but I sure like this rug’s feel, colors, design, and general feel of quality. Not flimsy— but it will need something to hold it down in the wind. That’s ok with me.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Cherrie B

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased to build my porch decor around this fabulous rug!
customer_reviews.text: Put this rug on my porch. What gorgeous colors. The color I chose blends well with the bright reds, yellows and oranges that are my color scheme. Just be aware that the rug may be somewhat bigger than described. I have limited space on my porch but made it work. Would never return this beautiful work of art! It does not show dirt and I have 2 dogs that are in and out all day dragging stuff from the yard. You can’t go wrong adding this stunning rug to your outdoor porch or patio. It’s vivid colors alone will make you smile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this rug. It's woven plastic which is exacltly what I was looking for since I put it on an outdoor deck exposed to rain and other elements. It dries super quick and can easily be hosed off. The colors are vibrant and beautiful. I have had it out a couple months now and it shows no signs of fading or wear. The colors are slightly different on both sides so you could flip it over and use either side. You don't always know what you're getting online but I'm super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love this -- As described
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pop of color for my roof deck patio, and something that would not fade and would withstand all kinds of weather. I bought several of these in different colors. Beautiful design and color. Versatile. Mix and match. Dries quickly when wet. Easy to clean and store. Reversible. The only drawback, if it's a drawback, is that this mat is very light. Mat has to be "weighted down" somehow to keep people from tripping over them and keep them from blowing away. Otherwise, I love them and they are prefect for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystel

customer_reviews.title: Durable and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! Realized today that it's been on my patio for over a year and a half now, has weathered the elements, and is still as vibrant and whole as it was when I first got it. That more than I can say for a different rug in the same style that I had bought previously from a different brand, which was flaking and coming unwoven in spots after only a year. Photo is taken at the end of the season (so pardon the empty pots!) in October after being outdoors in everything from rain to snow to bright sun for 17 months straight
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Shelden

customer_reviews.title: Create an Exotic Outdoor seating area!
customer_reviews.text: We have an Airstream Trailer that is permanently in place and has a large 20' x 20' deck with dining table and chairs; there is also a great seating area. This carpet transformed our simple seating into something out of a magazine! Plus I don't have to worry about it when it gets rained on or when I hose off the deck - it is totally waterproof...doesn't build up mold....dries quickly. If you are considering one of these for outdoors you will not regret it. Not something you would want indoors because it is made of a plastic material and is better suited for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: MauiSunny

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is nice, they sent the wrong color! The tag on the package said "rust" but it is not what is advertised in the photo. I waited 2 weeks for it due to COVID, only to be disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany DeBlasio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any weather and dog friendly, vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our deck - we live in MI, great quality and dog friendly, we have a standard poodle and no snags at all. No one believes it’s recycled material. Rain, wind sun...doesn’t matter and the sun has not faded it at all! I will bring in for the winter but spring summer and fall this will be on my deck! Beautiful colors bought the red/orange combo!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Easy clean, colorful and festive.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying Mad Mats. Love them. First one lasted, outdoors in somewhat harsh conditions, blazing morning sun, 4 or 5 years, before it started shedding a little. The old one has become the under the car maintenance mat and works great for that. Bought two new ones for front and back porches. Love this pattern as bright and festive as well. Never looks dirty as dirt falls right through, but super easy to wash with a hose. They can flip around in a wind, so it is good to put a bench or chair around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: I ended up purchasing some other ones that have held up a lot better. Otherwise it's colorful
customer_reviews.text: We have this out on our front porch and so far it's held up really well. The only problem we've had is that the Velcro pieces didn't really hold up as well (especially in the wind storm that we had 2 weeks ago). I ended up purchasing some other ones that have held up a lot better. Otherwise it's colorful, durable, and has survived snow, rain, and a lot of mud from construction crews walking on it. All it took was just hosing it off and all the mud was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Um this is crap. Photo shows a teal rug
customer_reviews.text: Um this is crap. Photo shows a teal rug, the one I received was dark blue. Also...the description aqua is not normally used to describe anything other than teal or light blue. *update: it looks like I was actually sent the wrong rug. I ordered the 5x8 aqua rug and received the blue 4×6 rug.
customer_reviews.author: KTS001

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Beautiful rug.
customer_reviews.text: I got this rug to cover awful stains on our concrete patio and it’s SO pretty! It unfolded and laid perfectly flat. No curled edges and the colors are vibrant and rich. This 100% makes my back patio look way nicer than it is! 🥳🥳 I’m thrilled with this purchase and would recommend and already have recommended this rug to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful color, durability, worth the money spent to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize a rug would update my small size deck and make it WOW me as much as It does when I’m out there. The pattern is beautiful, colors staying vibrant, an ease to clean. Good quality & a wonderful addition to my deck. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: It is part of the flooring in my greenhouse, and it is beautiful. The nice thing is that because it is not fabric, it will take water spills and dry without any problems at all. It is great for use outside or a place where moisture could be a problem. It has made my greenhouse look like a palace!
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: It looks like cheap plastic rag that does not hold its shape ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is much smaller than anticipated. It looks like cheap plastic rag that does not hold its shape even with provided velcro sticky pads. It was much too expensive for the quality and the look. This rug is outside our front door and is barely noticeable from the street, which may not be a bad thing. I ended up keeping it since my kids threw away original packaging. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: samir ruvinov

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a ton of compliments on this mat! I love it. It wipes clean easily. A potted plant blew over and dumped dirt all over this thing and I was able to just shake it off no problem. Love it! I'm ordering one for my mom as well.
customer_reviews.author: kaijohns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Practical Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous rug that looks beautiful on my patio! It looks like it won't mold because of the recycled plastic material. Normally, I like more natural materials but not for an outdoor rug that will be exposed to a lot of moisture. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these mats! I purchased a 4 X 6 and then we loved it so much I purchased the 6 X 9. We used this mat in our backyard and we use it camping. It is easy to clean off with a broom. I normally just rinse it off once I get home to get all the dust off. THe colors are great! I am hoping to purchase a larger one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, durable and exactly what I needed for the space
customer_reviews.text: Because of COVID, I needed to move out of my small office. I turned my carport in to an office where I could sit 10 feet away in a semi-outdoors environment. My carport has a dirt floor. At first, I ordered 1 carpet, then a second one. By the time I was done' I had 2 large and 2 medium rugs. I will wash them, roll them up and pull them back into service next late Spring when I again convert my carport into an office.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnabai

customer_reviews.title: Great  Oriental rug-looks like the real thing !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug!! Beautiful color and looks like an expensive oriental. I have two dogs and had to replaced a rug because they still have accidents. When my dogs make a mess all you have to to put some soap on a paper towel and wipe it up. I use this rug in my entry way and have received many complements!!!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for patio
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these rugs for the covered porch. The designs have a more formal oriental rug feel to them which I liked, versus the stripes you usually can get for outdoor use. Easy to clean with a hose. They are thin, so when a strong wind comes through, they can lift up and move. Just make sure you have them secured on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces of plastic break off....after a while...
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats and I have a few —two in the garden and one in the kitchen! After a couple of months they begin to shed meaning the plastic weeks off in little pieces and I need to vacuum not the rug itself but under and around the mat not sure why this is! Once it gets to that point I often rotate it to my garden...
customer_reviews.author: Desert doc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT thickness and size. Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I am using it on top of mulch; in the front yard of a home. It is great for our fire pit location. It is very pretty. Great colors and feels very durable. I am in no way associated with the company. I found this product viewing amazon. I am really glad I bought it. I feel like it will last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ciambriello-Patton

customer_reviews.title: Adds color to your patio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice after your eyes get accustomed to the image on the rug. It is plastic so I wasn’t sure if to use it for patio furniture since chairs are pulled in and out constantly. Trying to avoid tearing there so we just went with an actual rug for the table. If you would like a touch of color I’d recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colours and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Pictures do not do Mad Mats justice...the colours are vibrant and the product is lovely and feels great underfoot as a porch rug. All of our neighbours have commented on how beautiful it is. Bought one for my parents' patio several years ago and it has not faded...the colours are still every bit as vibrant. Really low maintenance, too. Just hose it down at the end of the season, let it dry, roll up, and store until next summer. Really lovely product!
customer_reviews.author: pamarama

customer_reviews.title: Nice for outside patio
customer_reviews.text: It is plastic but it’s perfect for our outdoor patio. It brightens up the entire space. Didn’t give 5 stars because the outside edges are a bit longer than the middle but that might fix itself once it’s laying out for a while. Just received it today so I’ll update list in a few months after it’s been sitting out in the Florida sun!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Outdoor Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mat I've ever had for my outdoor patio. Besides the pretty design and color, it also stays very clean and feels great on bare feet. I live in the wine country and so pollen/dirt/etc blowing over is always an issue. This has been outside for two months and still has not only held up great, but doesn't feel grimy or dirty. The only thing I would say is that the color (red/orange with purple accent) is a little duller than pictured. Still looks great though -- I'll probably purchase a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Emily V

customer_reviews.title: Mad Hats Creates Magical Area Rugs!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor rug is amazing! It is made from all plastic, however, the look of this rug is classy! The colors are pretty & vivid. I placed the rug under a grouping including: a teak glider, two old-school heavy metal spring chairs, some outdoor side tables and a few plants sprinkled around. With these pieces and plants the area rug makes every thing look cozy and inviting on our brick paver patio. I don't know how Mad Hats spins plastic into these beautiful, extremely perfect for outside weather, however, they do! Their prices are another reason we chose to purchase from them!
customer_reviews.author: J.G. Cappell

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors and Quality Rug
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I was anticipating for an outdoor rug. I may use it as a beach mat or a picnic mat and buy a different outdoor rug that is a lot bigger. The colors are vibrant and is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Csurf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & design
customer_reviews.text: Ordered black/tan. Labeling identifies it as such, but the rug is primarily tan/charcoal/bluish gray & gold. Suits my deck & furnishings just fine, so I will keep & enjoy it. Giving my rug ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ because of its exceptional quality and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: nice mat, but the color is a little off
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mat, but the colors are a bit off from what I was expecting based on the description. I ordered the "black and brown", paying extra for this rug over others like it because it was the only one in this style I'd seen offered in those colors. However, it's really brown, yellow and pale blue. No black at all. It's still nice enough, but be aware the color descriptions aren't entirely accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: vivid
customer_reviews.text: have bought before, loved, rebought. better pattern than most plastic outdoor rugs. actually feels nice. prolonged direct vehement sun and rain exposure will cause to disintergrate...my back porch is like the sahara with tropical storms so anything would have a hard time. if used inside a capret pad is a very good idea, food hoses out.
customer_reviews.author: Moo Moo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these recycled plastic indoor/outdoor rugs from Mad Mats before. I just love them. Rain goes right through them. No mildew. No dirt that can't be washed off. If they fade after a season or two, turn them over for a different rug, same design, reverse colors, wonderful. I am especially fond of this Oriental Turkish design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I am THRILLED with this 4X6 Turquoise mat. Ordered it this morning and it was on my door step by 7:30 PM.....same day. The colors are vibrant and stunning. Would like to cover my entire back patio with these mats. For now, it is one eye catching accent piece which transforms a bland concrete floor. Comes securely wrapped in good quality plastic, rolled around a 6 foot heavy duty cardboard tube. Says "Absolutely No Maintenance required." What could be better than that! Love the vibrant colors and pattern. Why settle for a basic brown or green rug when you can add this much life? I cannot stop looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: LC, Energy Medicine, Tampa, Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a plastic outdoor rug because nothing else has held up. We've only had it a short time so I can't speak to durability yet, but I'm very pleased with the rug so far. Colors are vivid and I love the design. Honestly, the price was so good that if for some reason it does not hold up I would probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: oncelaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Arizona dusty location.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is a perfect rug for my Arizona screened porch. It is not thick, and is waterproof. We have a lot of dust in the desert, and it is easy to hose this rug off. The colors are vibrant and beautiful. It is not very thick, but I have furniture on it. If it wasn’t weighted down, it may be too lightweight for outside and could tend to blow away.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. I should have thought better of this before purchasing a plastic rug. This product gets two stars for the wonderful pop of color it brought to my kitchen. But it fell apart under the dogs paws in less than a year, shedding tiny plastic "broom straws" constantly and creating an unpleasant texture under bare feet. I finally threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: ShallowWit

customer_reviews.title: Not woven properly in several different locations. Loose or ...
customer_reviews.text: Not woven properly in several different locations. Loose or extra plastic noticeable in several spots. Colors are gorgeous. Very attractive rug even with defects. I would not pay this price again for a mat with defects. Another seller on amazon sold me a similar mat with a“damaged box” for half the price with no imperfections in the plastic weaving. Will be asking seller for discount. I will update my review with any new information
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4x6 Turkish about six years ago and finally had to retire it. Everything gets old and faded sooner or later, right? But I couldn't believe how long it stood up to the relentless Southern California sunshine. To be honest, I probably should have replace it a year or so earlier, but the design is so great that I just can't imagine my patio without this terrific mat. I decided to dump it when I realized that I could just buy a new one---duh! They're pretty darned cheap when you factor in the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug but not eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this rug outside for just over a year and have loved it. Problem is recently I’ve noticed it’s starting to shed pieces and we have these tiny bits of colorful plastic all over our patio. Bad for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second Madmat. Love them. My first one significantly reduced the amount of grass and dirt my dogs and I track in from outside. And it is beautiful. And it shakes out clean easily. And it stands up to the sun. And it has square corners that hold their shape. Highly recommend these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best for outdoor/wet placement!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It also has an inverse side that I liked more so that's what the picture looks like on the aqua when is flipped. The quality is very high and it looks so much nicer than our previous polypropylene"rug" that was in same location. The cats and and age forced is to find this and I'm so glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: multifuel

customer_reviews.title: Pictures don't quite tell the whole story
customer_reviews.text: This item was not as pictured so I had to return it. From afar it looks very nice, but up close it looks like a cheap folding lawn chair made with that cheap vinyl tubing. The color was true though.
customer_reviews.author: DeCO

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year. I use it in the desert Boondocking, Out on rocks and gravel. Very sturdy. Easy clean, usually just shake it off. Since it is plastic, rain just passes right through. Very handy
customer_reviews.author: Katie33kate

customer_reviews.title: MAD MATS - superior choice!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Mad Mats for YEARS. Even after they've faded, they look good. Best color combinations and designs. BEST outdoor rugs around. Maybe a higher price, but WELL WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Goodrum

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant colorful
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and the water resistant quality. Dislike that we cannot seem to get the curled edges out from how it was rolled up and shipped to us which has caused tripping issues because it won’t lay completely flat even after it was rained on.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what it was like rolled out because I never took it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it was like rolled out because I never took it out of the package. I bought the black/tan but when it got here, it is brown, yellow and blue. returned without opening and had to pay shipping on MY end, not even in the refund process but I physically had to GO to a post office to return this which defeats the convenience purpose of prime in my opinion and very difficult as Im disabled. Wasn't happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought one and then came back for more
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I made the initial purchase. I like that it was made from recycled material but I wasn't sold on how it would feel underfoot. The color held up outside over the winter, so this spring, I bought three more. I love the vibrant colors and the turquoise is gorgeous, plus you have coordinate any pillow color. Simplified my decorating dilemmas on the decks.
customer_reviews.author: Ultraapril

customer_reviews.title: Good job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rug several years ago. It’s bright and colorful and has been on my front porch throughout the years. It was a terrific deal and well worth it., especially since it is made of recycled materials (plastic). It’s just now starting to degrade and “shed” bits of plastic. Need to be able to send it back for re-recycling! Will purchase again and bring it in during non-use months. Thanks Mad Mats. Good job recycling.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this rug very long so cannot comment on durability and sturdiness. We have it on the where my husband dumps a lot of gardening tools and vegetables. Easy to sweep off. I saw a smaller version of my rug last week at an art show. It complemented the artist's pottery.
customer_reviews.author: celnia greenma

customer_reviews.title: what a great product! I absolutely love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Mad Mats, what a great product! I absolutely love this rug! Delivery was fast, I removed from the packaging and to my surprise, I was simply delighted with the beauty and how well it is crafted. I will definitely be purchasing some more. Mad Mats has some other designs, and they are beautiful. Being that they are made from recycle plastic, mold will not be a problem. I love walking bare footed, it is quite comfortable to walk on it. Just love it!!! I really recommend this product if you are looking for outdoor rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Superwoman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor patio! Beautiful colors. Lots of colors and sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it on my outdoor patio and it LOOKS GREAT!!! Gorgeous colors and it’s made from recycled plastic (an added plus!) Seems to resist fading but I’ll know just how well at the end of Autumn.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think twice about the cost! I have spent hundreds on outdoor rugs that I toss after half a season, that fade and mold etc. etc. This is my 3rd of these; only because I want them EVERYWHERE!! They stay flat, color stays vibrant, dry immediately!! I would post more pics of my yard and rugs but rain coming so chair pads all put away! Don’t have to put away my mats!!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: A total no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest camper rug ever! Good price! Easy to clean. Lightweight, yet sturdy. I did purchase some stakes to keep it down, but honestly as long as their is a chair on it it's fine even in the wind. This is my favorite aesthetic purchase of my entire camper. I'm a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nybakken

customer_reviews.title: Great product, with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: The rug is a great looking rug and seems to be well constructed, although, I only have two reservations about it. One, as you may have seen in other pictures, the colors aren't really what they appear to be and are actually made up of two or three color weaves, but you can't notice it unless you're really looking for that. Two, the edges that are hemmed aren't even and that bugs a anal person like myself. But overall, it does look nice and it helps achieve the look we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Needs grommets
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It does a great job keeping dirt out of my van. Five stars if it had grommets for staking. You have to put something heavy on it or it will blow away in high winds. So I always have big rocks on the corners and stub my toes all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The colors are more vibrant in person. Adds beautiful color and style to our patio. Soft enough for little toddler feet and easy to clean (a must with 3 kids under 5 yrs!). The edges curl a bit but we did secure it with accompanying adhesive as we hose it down and hang it over railing to dry frequently. So happy with this purchase, just in love with the beautifully colorful design!
customer_reviews.author: jena_21

customer_reviews.title: Add a zing of color to your outdoor living space
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for boring screen porch to conceal chipped painted concrete floor . Very bright colors, exotic design, feels good underfoot. No problems with ends curling up.Only quibble is that the two mats (which ar placed side-by-side) differ in length by several inches. But this does not bother me- just be aware of it if you require exact sizing.Bought some new cushions for the furniture,now we sit there all the time enjoying the mosquito- free early fall weather These are a fun complement to outdoor living but I would nver use them indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Pea

customer_reviews.title: Great camping rug!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats- easy to clean and long lasting- we use them outside a trailer door to keep things cleaner- doesn't suck down into the ground after a rain, easy to hose off because it is plastic strand woven together-and it rolls up into a lightweight roll, so it's easy to carry in a car. It has an open weave so you wouldn't use it it for, say, a beach blanket or protection from a wet ground- the sand and water would come through, but for a porch or rv temporary rug that's easy to transport, looks very nice and keep things out of the dirt when camping, this is the rug.
customer_reviews.author: pattyl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, wish I bought a bigger one
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but very bright which my husband wasn't so much a fan of. I also wish I got a bigger size.. I saw another customer said that but I figured since my furniture was petite that it would be fine... which it is, but it still would look better with something bigger. My fault on that. We are using the backside of the rug, it looks great with my new outdoor furniture. Quality is nice, love that its low/no maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: MKK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Luv these rugs - I have several. Very durable, I use them on my front and back porches to add color. I store them rolled up for winter. You won’t be disappointed. I have the turquoise ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lene Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, just super tacky in real life. I was using it as an indoor rug since I have pets. I returned it. But it was very sturdy and would look awesome outside or in a room where you need a pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: jes phelps

customer_reviews.title: I gave 4 stars for the quality, deducted a star for the lack of color
customer_reviews.text: I believe the color description should read dark brown and mustard yellow. The design is not as 'crisp' (poor outline) compared to picture. At this time I am not able to report on quality or follow through on durability as I have only just received this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Really, really bright!
customer_reviews.text: In person this rug looks substantially brighter than in the photograph. "Gaudy" might not be too strong a description. Hence four stars instead of five. Otherwise, once I decided I could live with the colors, it looks great and is performing very well. We have placed it under our dining room table on top of the new short-pile carpet. It is protecting the carpet from spills, which are virtually invisible in the riot of the rug pattern. It is very light but is anchored by the table legs so stays in place when sliding chairs in and out. Hopefully it will hold up well -- so far I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lucchesa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this "rug!" I use it when I go camping and no matter what the ground is like, I'm able to lay this by the van barn doors and set up a great camp. Durable, doesn't absorb moisture, plus the dog loves to lay on it. When I'm ready to hit the road, just give it a good shake, roll it up, bungee it, and slide it under the bed and out of the way. No fading or fraying. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Salsa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rug for decks
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great outdoor rug on our deck. I researched quite a bit to find something that wouldn't mold or rot sitting on our deck and this fits the bill. We've had it for a month now and it's holding up great in the hot sun and stormy rains. It dries out quickly and doesn't retain water. It unfolded easily and laid flat right away. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this mat/rug while visiting my sister in Houston. She had it on her back patio and I loved it. She has had it for 4 years and it is a miracle rug. No mildew and this mat has been through many storms and floods. This year (after 4 years) she was going to order another one because she thought it was fading slightly from the sun exposure. She pulled it up and realized the back was vibrant and looked new. She flipped it over and is good for years to come.....no mildew, discoloration or signs of water damage. I'm loving this purchase and truly makes a big difference on my porch. Loving Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Rock Hill, SC

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so beautiful & can b easily washed off with a hose if need be. I am really impressed by the intricate pattern looks beautiful by my hot tub!
customer_reviews.author: Barbi

customer_reviews.title: Too beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect and vividly colored. I want the others.
customer_reviews.author: palikenei

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: The vivid colors of this mat and the fact that it is reversible make it two beautiful easy to care for mats in one. UPDATE!!!!! Almost exactly 2 years after purchasing and being on my patio only 4 months of that time (the other 20 months of that time it has been carefully rolled and stored indoors) it is falling apart. I would have expected more than 4 months of usage under light foot traffic and careful treatment. I unfortunately bought another Mad Mat a couple of months ago. I would not have purchased it had I known.
customer_reviews.author: LeMoyne

customer_reviews.title: Too bright!
customer_reviews.text: I have another Mad Mat rug that I use outside and absolutely love. But, this one is way too bright. It is very orange and I was hoping it looked like the colours in the photo. I am going to sell it/give it away and order another one that is darker in colour. Would be great for an outdoor patio that needed a pop of orange colour, but it doesn't suit my back porch at all.
customer_reviews.author: expat wife

customer_reviews.title: This mat is beautiful and bright
customer_reviews.text: This mat is beautiful and bright, but it is not an indoor rug and I would describe it as a plastic mat, not as a "rug". It is constructed of recycled plastic straws and this is very obvious in its appearance. The mat looks great on my patio and it has prompted many compliments. It's water proof and very easy to wipe clean. It doesn't receive a lot of foot traffic, so I can't comment about its durability level.
customer_reviews.author: jsm1

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love this rug!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rug. Well made. Would def buy again. Reverse as beautiful as front side if not more. Picture features the reverse side of the Aqua just after a rain storm. No water pools on the mat. I love it and am so happy with the purchase. The mat is comfortable to walk on in bare feet and to sit on. Appropriate for indoor or outdoor use. Comes with zero plastic packaging too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Pagliarulo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, perfect for the patio
customer_reviews.text: Got this to round out a Central Asian themed seating area on my back patio, and it was perfect. Easy to shake out or sweep, or hose off, for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: it hoses or sweeps off very easily. it is so much easier to sweep stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: loving my mad mat. it's out on my back porch where I have 4 dogs who do everything they aren't supposed to do on it. it hoses or sweeps off very easily. it is so much easier to sweep stuff off it with a broom than it was the concrete underneath. I especially love these colors/pattern. really livens up the living space. and it doesn't show dirt which I love. it was much lighter than I had anticipated. it came packed around a heavy card board tube that was most of the weight. but it seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 mats over 2 years. Although one began to unravel after just a few months, Mad Mats did replace the mat - still under warranty. I appreciate their commitment to their product and to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: David Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After one well it began chipping, didn't get a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: patio rug
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, it is easy to clean. I just use my leaf blower. If you live where it is windy, you will need to secure the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy , easy to clean! So Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Let be this s tugs having been buying Mad Matts for the last 15 years or so! They are durable easy to clean they hold up better if they are not in direct sun but they do well around the pool area they’re just clean and beautiful ! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful design. It transformed our front porch into a far more welcoming area. But those negative reviews were right. It has been out, on a sheltered porch, for less than five months. It has rarely gotten wet and has sunlight on a small area for only a few hours a day. Most of the rug isn't walked on. Yet it is falling apart. We are terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the RV
customer_reviews.text: Mostly we use this when camping in our VW. Perfect for keeping dirt out of the van. Sand and dirt are no match. Sheds water like a duck's back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A rug that will add the perfect pop of color to any outdoor space!
customer_reviews.text: The rug is made of some sort of what appears to be up-cylced plastic material. Which is great for an outdoor patio! My patio is shaded, so I can't say how it holds up in the elements, but it's doing amazingly well on my porch. I wanted my space to have a vibrant, exotic feel to it and this rug makes the look! I wouldn't use this rug indoors due to the material. Not the most comfortable on your bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great look and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I expected. It's got great vibrant colors, and it's easy to keep clean since it lives outside. I just rinse it with water if there is a lot of debris or dirt/pollen on it. Looks just lovely for our Moroccan themed patio.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Love Mad Mats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger Mad Mat that I purchased a few years ago that I use under my dining table and it's pretty awesome! I love their interpretation of "traditional" and wish I could find wool in the awesome color palates these guys use. This particular rug is a 24/7 outdoor rug. I've had it a few months and fading - which seems reasonable BUT I bought two cheaper outdoor rugs as a temp solution until I found what I wanted and they are falling apart already. The mad mat still looks brand new. The one I keep in the dining area also looks brand new still after almost 2 years! In short, they are well-made and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kmomo72

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, bright outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is made from recycled plastic. It’s very durable (even stands up to my cats clawing it) and the cheerful colors brighten up my screened-in porch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug in rust for my kitchen 2 years ago. I want to order another one for my living room. It is durable, the colors are gorgeous and it’s easy to keep super clean. I have pets and I never feel like I can get my traditional rugs as clean as I want. This you just hose down and wash with a mild soap. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for a patio! We were looking for something to add some color but was durable for outdoors. This definitely fits the bill. The colors are true to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Holly West

customer_reviews.title: My favorite outdoor rug of all time!
customer_reviews.text: This rug has taken beatings by a crazy puppy, many MANY kids, Oklahoma spring weather and poolside shenanigans. It doesn't bleach in the sun, it doesn't mold or grow any type of bacteria, it doesn't hold water and dries quickly. It's also crazy beautiful. I can't suggest this enough.
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

product_meta.title: Mad Mats Oriental Turkish Indoor/Outdoor Floor Mat, 6 by 9-Feet, Aqua
product_meta.description:
Come with us to the kasbah on our best selling Turkish patterned rugs. Mariachi Imports bold sense of color has infused this classic rug design with a renewed boldness, making them as beautiful in your outdoor space as in. Mad Mats are made from 100% recycled plastic, are UV protected and fade-proof, and come with our one-year color guarantee. Because our rugs are handmade, pattern, color and size may vary slightly.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Mad Mats' patterns are intricately woven. Multi-colored threads are woven in much the same fashion as real flat weave wool rugs. The result is a warmth and depth of color usually only available to the interior rug market. Most outdoor plastic mats on the market today are made from a combination of virgin polypropylene (PPL) and polystyrene. Mad Mats' plastic is completely different. First, our polypropylene is recycled from used soda bottles, milk bottles, packing, etc. We use only the highest grade of this recycled PPL. Then we combine it with state of the art conditioners and U.V. inhibitors to produce soft, resilient colorfast threads. Our soft tubular threads don't absorb dirt or stains of any kind. Leaves, debris, and food spills are easily rinsed away with a garden hose. They are truly carefree! This is a major advantage of Mad Mats. Most outdoor rugs are a dense weave of spun poly thread. They hold moisture for days which then gets tracked into the house. Grass, food, and dirt seep into the fiber where they remain until the rug is pulled up and washed, dried, and put back in place. YUCK! Mad Mats breathe. They don't trap water so they won't mildew and they won't rot wooden decks. Water goes right through them and evaporates right back out of them. Walking on Mad Mats the morning after a rainy night will leave your feet dry enough to walk right into the house. You put it down and that's it! All Mariachi products are produced under fair trade conditions. We do not work with factories that employ children or produce environmentally harmful waste.
feature_bullets: These are the original Mad Mats famous for their lasting quality and sophisticated design
Mad Mats are made of 100-percent recycled polypropylene and with polyester/nylon ribbon
Strong enough to be outside all year without care; Beautiful and sophisticated enough to go inside anywhere
Mad Mats breathe; they don't trap water so they won't mildew or rot wooden decks
Only genuine Mad Mats come with a one-year color guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars323 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
